element.name: CAS.ProductId
element.description: A Product's unique identifier within the CAS namespace.

element.name: CAS.ProductName
element.description: A Product's name within the CAS namespace.

element.name: CAS.ProductReceivedTime
element.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time that the Product was received.

element.name: Filename
element.description: The names of the files that represent this product.

element.name: FileLocation
element.description: The locations of the files that represent this product.

element.name: ProductType
element.description: Type of product, as specified by, e.g., a data bible.

element.name: ProductStructure
element.description: Whether or not a product is Flat (e.g., a set of independent files), or hierarchical, e.g., a dir structure.

element.name: MimeType
element.description: The IETF mime type of this product.

element.name: DataVersion
element.description: The version of the data product
